meanings.definition: Not self-conscious or aware of oneself
meanings.sent1: She danced in an unselfconscious manner, not worrying about how she looked.
meanings.sent2: The children played unselfconsciously, lost in their own world of imagination.
meanings.sent3: He told jokes with an unselfconscious charm that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork flowed from an unselfconscious place within her, capturing raw emotions.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's unselfconscious joy was contagious, bringing smiles to everyone around.

meanings.definition: Acting or behaving without self-consciousness or inhibition
meanings.sent1: The actor delivered his lines unselfconsciously, fully immersed in his character.
meanings.sent2: She sang unselfconsciously, letting her voice soar without hesitation.
meanings.sent3: The toddler ran around unselfconsciously, not caring about who was watching.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted unselfconsciously, letting creativity guide every brushstroke.
meanings.sent5: His unselfconscious confidence on stage captivated the audience, drawing them into his performance.
